author: muddlebee
content: I can also join right? I am still at `Project Discovery` stage trying to make the documentation publicly consumable, which is not currently.

author: trent_vanepps
content:
<@&857649635274915900> **Only 1 week left** (Nov 15) to write up your showcase profile if you participated in the first cohort! we'll be giving out a POAP for anyone who submits

This is important for wrapping your participation in the program & informing how we approach future cohorts. Please do it soon - especially if you received funding support üôè  Kudos to <@!147269256042643456> for being the first 

Add yours here: https://github.com/ethereum-cdap/cohort-zero/tree/main/showcase

author: timbeiko
content: Even if you are already employed/found a job/etc. it's useful to have these for future CDAP participants who can see the accomplishments of folks in the program üòÑ

content: attending the zoom sessions from the Ethereum community has been really helpful for a newbie like me. Even If I don't get the full gist of things I get some key pointers to explore and study
